name: Pirate Codex (Web Edition)
description:
Don't let yourself fooled by two pirates! Save the ship before the sea monsters take control over it!

Pirate Codex can be a challengeful singleplayer or a fun co-op game with your friends. Fight against monsters while moving your characters together.

The two character has a rope between them and they are trying to catch the monsters with it, but be careful, if the characters are too far away from eachother the rope breaks. 

There are bosses, upgrades, potions and abilities!

Use WASD and Arrows to control the two character. 1-4 numbers are for potions and abilities and T button is the pause. Thats all :D The game has controller support so you can play with controllers too!

I am really curious about the community's opinion about my first game, I hope you have a great time with this game. Ideas and critics are appreciated, I would love to hear them both to make the game better :)

You must ask permission if you want to upload this game on your own website.
